page.title: 02GEOGRAPHICAL LANDMARKS
page.content: THE SCHOOL IS SITUATED IN THE S.W. CORNER OF THE AREA SURVEYED. AT THE BOTTOM OF SCHOOL ROAD STANDS THE WAR MEMORIAL TO THE DEAD OF WORLD WARS 1 AND 2. THE PARISH CHURCH MANSE IS SITUATED TO THE EAST OF THE SCHOOL AT THE JUNCTION OF SCHOOL ROAD WITH HUNTINGFAULDS ROAD (THE CHURCH AND GRAVEYARD ARE OUTWITH THE SURVEY BLOCK).THE MINISTER OF THE COMBINED PARISHES OF AUCHTERHOUSE,TEALING AND MURROES IS REV.HELEN JOHNSTONE M.A.,B.D. THE A929,DUNDEE TO FORFAR ROAD,WHICH IS A MILE EAST OF THE SCHOOL IS UNDERGOING CONSIDERABLE ALTERATION AT PRESENT AS WORK ON THE CONTINUATION OF THE DUAL CARRIAGEWAY FROM DUNDEE TO TARBRAX PROCEEDS.
